definition: an impression in a surface (as made by a blow), make a depression into
details:
noun
- an impression in a surface (as made by a blow)
= synonyms: nick
- an appreciable consequence (especially a lessening)
= example: an appreciable consequence (especially a lessening)
- a depression scratched or carved into a surface
= synonyms: incision
verb
- make a depression into
= example: make a depression into
= synonyms: indent
